introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to POLISSYA GRANITE. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect from you while you use our website, and how we use, maintain, and disclose this information.

content.personal_info: We collect personal information that you provide when you register, place an order, or interact with our services. This may include your name, email address, postal address, and payment information.
content.cookies_and_usage_data: We use cookies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

use_of_data.heading: Use of Data
use_of_data.content: The data we collect helps us provide and improve our services. Specifically, we use the data for: Completing transactions and delivering products. Providing customer support. Enhancing user experience and improving the functionality of our services. Marketing and promotional efforts, subject to your consent where required by law.

data_sharing_and_disclosure.heading: Data Sharing and Disclosure
data_sharing_and_disclosure.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

security.heading: Security
security.content: We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

changes_to_policy.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes_to_policy.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
